definitions.title: Pe.
definitions.body: syncop. (so Targum D:§ 70, 9, Eg. Aram. Cooke:209, Impf. S-C:D 22, G 25, 28) go, of men: Impf. 3 ms. [[וִיהַח]] (K:§ 44 a; al. [[וִיהָח]]) Ezr 6:5, [[יְהָָךְ]] Ezr 5:5; of inanimate things = be brought, Ezr 7:13; Inf. [[לִמְהַח]] (K:l. c.; al. [[חָ֠]]) v:Ezr 7:13.

definitions.title: Haph.
definitions.body: id.: Pt. pl. [[מַהְלְכִין]] Da 3:25 ([[בְּגוֹא]]); fig. Da 4:34 walk in pride (? rd.
